overview:
Dale Pixley is Director of Client Services at Enginuity PLM. Dale brings over 26 years of experience in global, formula-based product development to Enginuity. He works to understand customer needs at a fundamental level â€“ and then ensures exceptional software design and implementation by acting as a liaison between the Enginuity development team and the customer’s formulation scientists, regulatory team and product development staff.

Dale captures new business development opportunities and provides strategic guidance around product development strategies and execution of marketing plans. Prior to joining Enginuity, Dale worked for Clairol, Inc. and the Clairol Division of Procter & Gamble (P&G) as a research scientist, product formulator, and product manager for a spectrum of hair care products.
